attributes.action: To save Air Products Manufacturing Facility, N. Wales. The only facility of it's kind in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a Global American Company a decision has been made to 1. maintain the loss making facility in America 2. close the N. Wales facility at the cost of 200 skilled jobs (not forgetting the knock on affect job losses in an already depressed local economy) 3. move all contracts outside of America to China. Do not let another Major Manufacturer leave the UK to Asia Forever!

government_responses.details:
